synopsis.text: Kukuru, a young boy from the primitive era, encounters Doraemon, Nobita, Shizuka, Jyaian, and Suneo when they travel back in time to find a place to call their own, away from their current lives. The group discovers that all land in their present is owned, leading them to explore prehistoric Japan. As they settle into their new surroundings, they learn about Kukuru's tribe, which has been enslaved by a shaman from a rival tribe. With a sense of duty and friendship, Doraemon and the gang embark on a mission to help Kukuru rescue his people and confront the dangerous dark tribe. Meanwhile, a glitch in space-time brings Kukuru to the group's present, adding an extra layer of adventure to this heartwarming tale of camaraderie and courage.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
